articles.title: All about this week’s Pacific super blood moon lunar eclipse - South China Morning Post
articles.description: With the moon at its closest point to Earth, and a full moon, Hong Kong will witness a total lunar eclipse on Wednesday. The spectacular sight will also be visible from East Asia to the US west coast if skies are clear.

articles.author: Recto Mercene
articles.title: Amid 'swarming,' fishing ban, PHL, China hold bilateral talks | Recto Mercene - Business Mirror
articles.description: AMID Manila’s protests over the “swarming” of Beijing’s militia boats in the West Philippine Sea and the latter’s imposition of a “fishing ban” which Manila has ignored, the two Asian countries held a friendly and candid exchange on the situation and specific…

articles.author: Keith Bradsher, Chris Buckley
articles.title: Yuan Longping, Plant Scientist Who Helped Curb Famine, Dies at 90 - The New York Times
articles.description: His development of high-yield rice hybrids in the 1970s led to steeply rising harvests in Asia and Africa and made him a national hero in China, credited with saving countless lives.
articles.content: Mr. Yuan chose to specialize in crop genetics at a time when the subject was an ideological minefield in China. Mao Zedong had embraced the doctrines of Soviet scientists who rejected modern genetics… [+2018 chars]

articles.title: Taiwan says China is spreading fake news during Covid spike - AsiaOne
articles.description: A Taiwanese official accused China on Saturday of spreading fake news about the Covid-19 situation on the island, saying this was why the government was publicising and refuting instances of false information that have been circulating online. After months of…
